subject: Sports Injuries
Hockey, Ice
Olympic Games (2014)
lead_paragraph: Potential Olympians like Canada’s Steven Stamkos, Slovakia’s Marian Gaborik, Sweden’s Alex Steen and Russia’s Evgeni Malkin are among the N.H.L. players out with injuries.
snippet: Potential Olympians like Canada’s Steven Stamkos, Slovakia’s Marian Gaborik, Sweden’s Alex Steen and Russia’s Evgeni Malkin are among the N.H.L. players out with injuries.
